abstracts.cdata!:
The objectives of the Primary Education
            Project (Second Education) are to improve the accessibility,
            administration and quality of primary education in low
            income urban and rural areas. The GOP hopes to achieve this
            by: (i) providing 50,000 new student places to accommodate
            76,500 students in double shifts; and by (ii) improving
            school management practices and training school
            administrators and teachers.The project aims to; (iii)
            provide textbooks and other learning materials; and to (iv)
            expand bilingual education programs for Aymara- and
            Quechua-speaking children. The project also seeks to
            strengthen the Ministry of Education's (MOE) project
            execution and operating capacity.
